item.title: China’s COL Launches Micro-Drama Empire With 1,000+ Titles – Global Bulletin
item.description: MICRODRAMA MARVEL Chinese media giant COL has unveiled its global content distribution division, positioning itself as the world’s largest micro-drama reseller with over 1,000 titles in English
